name: hhnm

body.origin:
|- wceq(cno, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
-| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wcel(c0, cnv)
body.pretty:
⊢ normh =(normCV ` c0)
⊣ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ c0 ∈ NrmCVec
